basicInfo.name: Amelia
basicInfo.flavor: After he was injured by a strong villain, Hyperman sought out Amelia. He entrusted her with the suit he developed and wanted her to become the new symbol of hope. Honoring his will, Amelia set off the find the villain.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Entry Denied!
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Concussion. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 55% of the caster's Physical Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 70% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Save the Day!
Skill 2.desc:
Enemy with the Highest Defense
 - 100% chance to inflict Unable to Recover. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 135% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 165% of Physical Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Changes Number of Targets: To 2 Enemies with the highest Defense.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 55% HP Alteration.

Passive.name: Advanced Nanosuit
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Revives with 55% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
 - 2 Allies (Excluding Self)
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 90% of the caster's Physical Attack upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [2 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Grants 3 Debuff Removal(s) upon falling in battle. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Effect Hit Rate Boost to 49%.

Passive (Trans).name: Advanced Nanosuit
Passive (Trans).desc:
2 Allies
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 90% of Physical Attack.
 - Grants 3 Debuff Removal(s).

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Comic books, heroes, Hyperman, Robin, justice, hope, the people
profile.dislikes: Night Magician, villains, evil, cowardice, despair
profile.story: After he was injured by a strong villain, Hyperman sought out Amelia. He entrusted her with the suit he developed and wanted her to become the new symbol of hope. Honoring his will, Amelia set off the find the villain.

basicInfo.name: Amelia
basicInfo.flavor: Amelia first met Hyperman during a fire at her school. They stayed in touch afterwards, and, inspired by his words, she dreamed of becoming like him. With school closed from the fire, she decided to become Hyperman's sidekick.

 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Physical Attack.

basicInfo.name: Amelia
basicInfo.flavor: Amelia was unusually strong since birth. Due to an incident in her childhood, she is timid and hesitant to use her power.
